channel.title: Shithole
channel.description:
Ok, so here is the story. Looking to get a cheap airsoft pistol, right? So I make an ebay account, and don't know you need paypal. So I click buy it now on an item, and pretty much I can't cancel my order, it says im obliged to pay. I contacted the seller, but idk what to do if they turn me down. I don't know how to get 20$ on paypal fast, either, due to the fact I don't have a bank account.
Policy overview When a buyer wins an item or uses Buy It Now to purchase an item, they're obligated to complete the purchase by sending full payment to the seller. If a buyer doesn't pay within 4 days, sellers can open an unpaid item case in the Resolution Center. If the buyer still doesn't pay or reach some other agreement with the seller, eBay may record the unpaid item on the buyer's account. When an unpaid item case closes without payment from the buyer, sellers are eligible to receive a final value fee credit to their eBay seller account. Also, if they relist the item and it sells the second time, eBay may refund the insertion fee for the relisting. Learn more about how the free relist policy works Excessive unpaid items on a buyer's account may result in range of action, including limits on buying and selling privileges or suspension of the account. .
Don't tell me I know I wasn't supposed to make an ebay account because I'm not 18, I just want some damn help.

item.title: Shithole
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12

@durial12 wrote:

I see why that post may not have made much sense to anyone.

Read full topic

item.title: Shithole
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

durial12:

Log onto your paypal. You can attack a debit/bank card to it, so it takes money from the card just like a normal transaction.

Wow thanks! Now I’m going to attack a debit/bank card to it immediately! LOL.

Read full topic

item.title: Shithole
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

if you have a visa giftcard you can put the card in your name on the visa site and use paypal, paypal wont accept the card until it matches your name.

Read full topic

item.title: Shithole
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Are you talking about this gun for $20?

http://www.airsoftmegastore.com/KJW_Full_Metal_M9_Beretta_p/gbb601s.htm

If so, either the seller is a retard or it’s broken.

Nice choice though. Although off-topic, I’m ordering this guy in a couple of weeks:

http://www.airsoftpost.com/product_info.php?products_id=29583

Not sure if I should get the black grip/chrome finish or the black finish/wood grip. Anyway, I hope you work your problem out and I won’t try to further derail this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Shithole
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

gravenfire23:

From what it seems it sound like the can at max just suspend your account, or is there something im not seeing

When an unpaid item case closes without payment from the buyer, sellers are eligible to receive a final value fee credit to their eBay seller account. Also, if they relist the item and it sells the second time, eBay may refund the insertion fee for the relisting. Learn more about how the free relist policy works

So that basically means ebay will give them money for that item, and if they put it up for auction again, and it sells, ebay gets their money back? Because as far as I’m reading it, I’m pretty nothing completely bad can happen to me besides the need to make a new ebay account when I decide to use paypal.

Read full topic

Moparisthebest:

Parents? Guardians? Aunts/uncles, cousins etc etc?

I have parents, yes. They might get kinda mad though. I was trying to resolve on my own for the next 2 days, and If I couldn’t get it then, then I’d ask for their assisstance. In the mean time, I pray that ebay user is nice.

item.title: Shithole
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:10, topic:391043”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=486993.msg3569318#msg3569318 date=1302918098]

It denied it.
If someone would send me 20$ on paypal, I’ll send 20$ in cash to your address (USA please)

I’d less than three to do that, but my parents are extremely stubborn and if I try to explain, they won’t listen and buries all ma stoof somewere in the neighborhood, and my bro wouldn’t back me up either because he thinks he has infinite knowledge and knows everything; srry bro D:

Also, just curious, what pistol?

beretta m9 20$ full metal 240fps w\ .2
[/quote]
Hm… sounds nice… but full metal for $20? Doesnt sound right… metal doesnt go with 240 fps if you ask me, i guess thats why its cheap? And thats probably the power of ebay :P[/quote]

Mhm. This isn’t helping.

Anyone wanna do my deal?
I’ll send u 20$ in the mail for 20 paypal dollars.

Read full topic
